card.name: Last Dream
card.description: In hand, this has +1 {{COST}} for each different {{TRIBE:LOST_SOUL|1}} in your dustpile. Trigger the {{KW:DUST}} effects of each.

description.now: In hand, this has +1 {{COST}} for each different {{TRIBE:LOST_SOUL|1}} in your dustpile. Trigger the {{KW:DUST}} effects of each.
description.prev: Give all ally monsters +1/+1. If you have 1 {{HP}}, give them +7/+7 instead.
